values:
i am officially, as of today in 10 minutes no longer employed at people first.
ill be picking up the rental on wednesday
mom is flying up on friday
when next you hear from me i will be a floridian

PEACE OUT

.
http://sweetprisonsex.livejournal.com/88421.html

easter was good, told the family of my intentions. 
they werent happy at first but what can they really say?  
im goin on 25 and have everything planned and ready and waiting
not their call
after a little bit they warmed up to the idea and were "ok" with it....sort of
theyll miss me n stuff but whatever they only see me a couple times a year so as it is,
theyll live, and they can always come visit



Just tell me what you've got to say to me,
I've been waiting for so long to hear the truth,
It comes as no surprise at all you see,
So cut the crap and tell me that we're through.

Now I know your heart, I know your mind,
You don't even know you're being unkind,
So much for all your high brow Marxist ways,
Just use me up and then you walk away.
Boy, you can't play me that way.

Well I guess what you say is true,
I could never be the right kind of girl for you,
I could never be your woman.

When I saw my best friend yesterday,
She said she never liked you from the start,
Well me, I wish that I could claim the same,
But you always knew you held my heart.

You're such a charming, handsome man,
Now I think I finally understand,
Is it in your genes?, I don't know,
But I'll soon find out, that's for sure,
Why did you play me this way?

Well I guess what you say is true -
I could never be the right kind of girl for you!

Well I guess what they say is true,
I could never spend my life with a man like you
I could never be your woman.
http://sweetprisonsex.livejournal.com/88080.html

so yeah....its been a while huh?
::shades eyes and peers out into the darkness::
anyone still out there?  lol

hi! im alive and kickin quite well
tons has happened and nothings happened in the past year +
isnt it funny how that works?

ive loved - ive lost - ive laughed and cried
all of the usual goings on

couple of major things come to mind

my grandfather was diagnosed with cancer with a year to live
this was back around christmas
stage 4 metabolic lung cancer
hes on chemo every week, and it seems to be helping
hes always very tired and sore the next day but hes doing better with it
he dosnt get sick from it anymore and the tumors are 
showing signs of shrinkage which it THIS case is a very good thing
his spirits are up and he stays hopeful but isnt expecting much 
:/  ever the realist i suppose

my brother finally got shipped of to iraq on wed.
hes in the navy and has been in and out of training all over the country.
some sort of para-rescue thing, i dunno
hell be doing a 2 month tour with his company, 
come back for a  month or so and go again for another 6 months....
i was hoping we'd be pulling out from over there by now
but i guess thats not happening any time soon
hes had a death wish most of his life, hope he dosnt do anything too stupid

im still working as a product specialist at people first
dont like it much but at least im good at it
wont be doin it for much longer though

im finally moving to florida
its really truly official this time
puttin in my two weeks and keepin an eye on air fares
my mom n her husband are flyin up to help me drive the truck down
got money saved up, a home and job waiting for me down there, 
and nothin to hold me back here

im so excited

life is good and about to unfold in front of me
ill be leaving mid may
if theres any old chums still out there do look into gettin together
i am as ever up for adventures

  \_/
http://sweetprisonsex.livejournal.com/87855.html

HaPpY fRiDaY tHe 13th EvErYbOdY!!!!! got full time at people first on wed. this is good last day at the hill is tomorrow.... of course i open i think ill miss it....my customers were awesome wont miss all the bullshit tho obviously ok...off to start yet another day be on the lookout for strange happenings ;P
http://sweetprisonsex.livejournal.com/87624.html

so i got the job at my bank...and im still working at the hill for a bit
just got back from my second day of training...and i get to open the store tomorrow morning    yaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaay   sux so bad...i cant wait till im done with training and get full time at the bank so i can finally QUIT that freakin place.

in other news
TOOL CONCERT THURSDAY NIGHT!!!   I CANT WAIT!!!!  AAAAHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!
SO excited. 
going with my scotty
SO excited
its gonna be GREAT
SO excited

sux that i work til 5:30 and the concert is in jersey and it starts at 8.
i was hoping to leave around 4 to get there with plenty of time and get a good spot, cuz i was a dip-shit and waited to long to get tix so were on the lawn...but whatever
SO excited


i love my tooooooool!!!!!!!!!!

and i love my scotty

SO excited

.
http://sweetprisonsex.livejournal.com/87333.html

lets see....

been working on illustration/map making for the fantasy novel cassandra's writing....going swimmingly

been working my ass off at the god damn HILL...thank gods that will all be over soon
i have a job lined up at my bank, where i will either be a teller (part-time @ first and full time as soon as they have an opening), or (hopefully) i will be some sort of manager....so long as THAT position opens up. will be in training at the end of this month either way...YAY

have gone to a few shows...including three days grace last night...which was SOOOOOOOOOOO good....i had a blast

reading a lot

started up a myspace page that i really dont use for much of anything but being nosy lol
http://profile.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=user.viewprofile&friendid=29729644
for anyone whos interested...if not you're not missing much

Zoe (the snake) is getting huge

Sabrina got a bunny a few weeks ago...little shit-box is too cute for her own good

my brother leaves for boot-camp at the end of the week....kinda sux but i never really talk to him anyway so i guess ill live. i only hope that dip-shit in office is out before he has a chance to send him to some horrible and useless death

i dunno....i may think of something to add later
for now im going to change out of my work uniform n go lay down n read n try to pass out....gotta be up at 3 am to open the store....   yaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaay
::cough  cough:: *sarcasm* ::cough::

peace
http://sweetprisonsex.livejournal.com/87255.html

yesterday....was...GREAT!!

im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver im a licensed driver !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

oh yeah...thats right...outta my way cuz here i come!! 

i had the same guy as last time...and he remembered me (cuz of the stickers on my car). i knew he would as soon as i saw it was gonna be him again.  i signaled everywhere, drove ridiculously slow, and doubled the time *i* needed to stop at stop signs to make sure it was long enough for him...  i went from 226 pts last time to 16 this time...YAY!!!

after that brian and i came home n watched shrek 2 n george n douggie n shiggs stopped over for a little.  then brian left to play poker (he plays almost every fri  nite) and i went to cassandras to work on the map for the book shes writing. finally completed the outline and got *most* of the geography marked out, now i just need to go back n tweak some things, add some detail, and more cities/towns  then ill be ready to transfer it onto the poster board we got the other day for the final copy (and use the spiffy cool landscape colored pencils we also picked up the other day)

yay!!  go me!!



ok time for work  >_<

the Alright Guy.

Hey, you're an alright guy! You do alittle camping, then come home and check your email. You know to put out your camfire and to keep your computer dust-free. You like physical labor and surfing the internet. You're an alright guy.

i didnt get my lisence :( but at least i actually got to take the test this time.... pretty much everything i could to wrong i did, except for the parallel parking lol i forgot my turn signal when parking, i ran a couple stop signs (not really but i didnt come to a COMPLETE stop) i did 30 in a 25, and when i came to an intersection where a car was waiting to pull out i gave them the right of way but i was inching out getting ready to go....30 pts passes, 31 fails - i had 226 pts...oops oh well now i know for next time lol

tomorrow i try to get my lisence again.
(ihopeihopeihope)
the weather is supposed to be good so thats a plus, i was afraid we were gonna end up getting another snow storm and id have to try to pass this thing in my shitty car with bald tires in snow and ice.  
ive been practicing parallel parking, im screwed tho...every 2 out of 3 times i try i fuck it up. 
i dont need a lot of room to get into the spot, but i have a hard time getting far enough into the space without hitting the curb, or getting into the space and being straight.  why does this shit have to be so damn complicated lol. i never need to parallel park - ever... wtf...  
i should be exempt from that part of it...just cuz i say so  XD

wish me luck

lets see.... i got my permit renewed, and resceduled my driver test for the 31st....(i hope i hope i hope) a friend of mine makes sculptures and moulds n stuff using all kinds of resins n metals. ive been helping him make them for a couple years now. he used to work for a company called smooth on, and is trying to get back with them. his friend in the company happens to be one of my customers at TH, and he might be able to get me a job there pouring moulds, and sample pallets for different resins...starting at 18/hr 0_o thats 10 more than im making now.....(i hope i hope i hope) my roomate got a new g/f, im happy for her. her g/f seems nice..... too bad she turned into a total hypocrite (sp?) and everything that she bitched at me constantly, over the past 3 years, about me and brian for, she is now doing...spending every waking moment together, and having her here all the time and so on... granted i dont hold any of that against her, i knew, once she found someone, thats how it would be. thats how its SUPPOSED to be, the point is shes made such a big stink about it for so long and now she turns around and does it herself....thats a little fucked up. but whatever...brian and i are gonna look for an apartment soon. if i get that smooth on job and he gets the job with a friend of his doing construction/remodeling, making about the same im hoping to make, we'll do just fine, and we can really start saving to move south. i still dont know if it will be florida or georgia, but i still deffinetly wanna get the HELL outta here. this state blows goats.....whos commin with me ??

ok...off to work, time to open the store for another glorious day of money-making wooooooooooooooooo

hoooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo
http://sweetprisonsex.livejournal.com/85883.html

yeah so...  penndot is a bunch of ASSHOLES.  grrrr...
i left with just enough time to get there yesterday, got about halfway there and realized not only that brian forgot his lisence, but that it expired 4 days ago...but we went and got it anyway, and STILL got there at 9 on the dot (when i was supposed to be there).
so i went and parked and we went in to see what i needed to do. the guy inside said to park in the training bay n the instructor would be there in a minute.
ok....no problem....
went to move the car, while brian stood on the sidewalk to smoke a cigarette, not 10 ft away.
i moved my car 3 SPACES...and the instructor was like "whos taking the test today?"
i said i was n he said "not today....you were driving without a lisence, go home and rescheduel"
....WHAT??
i know theyre there to pick out every little thing i do wrong n everything but COME ON!!
its not like i drove there myself, i just moved over a few spaces to where i needed to be, and i did have someone *right there*... but he wasnt physically in the car with me, so i never even got to take the test. 
now i have to wait 6 weeks to take it again, and my permit expires in 2-3 weeks....goddamnit godamnit!!

even if brian had been in the car with me, i probably wouldnt have been sent home any way b/c of his lisence being expired...but still....what the shit

im looking for a guy. 
well...IM not looking for this guy...a kickass band is looking for a guy.
this guy needs to be between 20 - 26, able to play the guitar and piano good 
enough to rock my socks off, and he needs to look good doing it.
if anyone out there fits that criteria, and lives relatively nearby, and isnt 
totally full of himself, and is interested in hooking up with a rising gig 
(already signed to a lable and just looking to complete the circle) let me know 
and i will put you in touch...
anyone who knows someone who you think might be interested please do the same
they are almost done recording and time is running out.

they already auditioned 20+ people, but no one made the cut. so if you DO try out, 
and you dont make it, dont take it personally, they are VERY selective.

please get ahold of me ASAP....

you cant make it if you dont try.

oh well...
guess im just chicken shit.

You Are Strawberry Ice Cream
A bit shy and sensitive, you are sweet to the core. You often find yourself on the outside looking in. Insightful and pensive, you really understand how the world works. You are most compatible with chocolate chip ice cream.
What Flavor Ice Cream Are You?
florida was GREAT. i had an awseome time with my mom, even though i was at church EVERY day (shes a born again christian and she lives a block away from her church, where she also works as a custodian, so i went every day to help her clean so we got done faster) we went thru the attic and pulled down all the boxes of old crap she kept over the years (shes even more of a pack-rat than I am, thats pretty bad) i remembered most of it. we sculpted clay, i made an elephant n it was really good, but it was natural clay n we needed a kiln to fire it...which we obviously didnt have, n while it was air drying it got knocked over n the ear broke off :( oh well she took me all over showing me off to EVERYONE she knew n they were all "So happy to see me, n they felt like they already knew me for how much she talked about me" ... great, the first sunday i was there i swear the entire congregation came up to me at some point and said those same words, n all of her friends and "family" (she adopted ppl as her family since her real, and real adoptive family sucked) said the same thing too...then it was "so when are you moving down here to keep her this happy all the time?" (i hope to move down there in about a year) we went out on a boat in the bay which felt like bathwater when we swam in it. i got a little burned but that went away in a few days n youd never be able to tell i got ANY sun from looking at me now...i hate my complexion. i read the ENTIRE 'elf quest' series which i havent done in 10 years...i picked up on SO much more. man i love my elfs. XD my mom started knitting me a scarf the second day i was down there and finished it about 20 minutes before i got on the plane to come back lol. its really cool but its pink, yellow and green (the most recent picture she had of me was my 7th grade photo...in it i wore a hideous sweater that i HATED with pink, yellow, n green stripes...she thought it would be cute) it has pom-poms on both ends, which are stitched into pockets, so if i forget my gloves i can put my hands it them, or it can hold my cigs n cell phone....pretty handy. we did some other stuff too...but im tired and i need to go to bed...i have a long day tomorrow. i have to open the store at 5, n then come home at 2 and get a check for $350,000 O_o oh yeah...thats right...im getting a hefty check tomorrow...HA in yo face bitches !!! nitey nite :)

IM GOIN TO FLORIDAAAAAA!!! im leavin on friday n wont be back for 2 weeks YYYYYAAAAAAAYYYYYY!!!!!!!!!! i so cant wait my mom is FREAKIN OUT let me tell you what. she has been beggin me to get down there for so long n i texted her today, n just said "i will be with you from the 30th to the 14th". she got back to me within 5 minutes with "OOOOOHHHHHHH MY GOOOOSSSSHHH!!!! PRAISE THE LORD" (lol shes a born again jesus freak now....fun fun) it was funny....guess you had to be there how many cubans does it take to make a sandwich? depends on how thin you slice em hee hee

Emo Kid
You are 28% Rational, 14% Extroverted, 28% Brutal, and 28% Arrogant.
You are the Emo Kid, best described as a quiet pussy! You tend to be an intuitive rather than a logical thinker, meaning you rely more on your feelings than your thoughts. Not only that, but you are introverted, gentle, and rather humble. You embody all the traits of the perfect emo kid. You are a push-over, emotional, gentle to the extent of absurdity, and so humble that it even makes Jesus puke. If you write poetry, you no doubt write angsty, syrupy lines about depression, sadness, and other such redundant states of emo-being. Your personality is defective because you are too gentle, rather underconfident in yourself, decidely lacking in any rational thought, and also a bit too inhibited.

I probably made you cry, didn't I? Fucking Emo Kid.

To put it less negatively:

1. You are more INTUITIVE than rational.

2. You are more INTROVERTED than extroverted.

3. You are more GENTLE than brutal.

4. You are more HUMBLE than arrogant.

Compatibility:

Your exact opposite is the Smartass.

Other personalities you would probably get along with are the Hippie, the Televangelist, and the Starving Artist.

*

*

If you scored near fifty percent for a certain trait (42%-58%), you could very well go either way. For example, someone with 42% Extroversion is slightly leaning towards being an introvert, but is close enough to being an extrovert to be classified that way as well. Below is a list of the other personality types so that you can determine which other possible categories you may fill if you scored near fifty percent for certain traits.

The other personality types:

The Emo Kid: Intuitive, Introverted, Gentle, Humble.

The Starving Artist: Intuitive, Introverted, Gentle, Arrogant.

The Bitch-Slap: Intuitive, Introverted, Brutal, Humble.

The Brute: Intuitive, Introverted, Brutal, Arrogant.

The Hippie: Intuitive, Extroverted, Gentle, Humble.

The Televangelist: Intuitive, Extroverted, Gentle, Arrogant.

The Schoolyard Bully: Intuitive, Extroverted, Brutal, Humble.

The Class Clown: Intuitive, Extroverted, Brutal, Arrogant.

The Robot: Rational, Introverted, Gentle, Humble.

The Haughty Intellectual: Rational, Introverted, Gentle, Arrogant.

The Spiteful Loner: Rational, Introverted, Brutal, Humble.

The Sociopath: Rational, Introverted, Brutal, Arrogant.

The Hand-Raiser: Rational, Extroverted, Gentle, Humble.

The Braggart: Rational, Extroverted, Gentle, Arrogant.

The Capitalist Pig: Rational, Extroverted, Brutal, Humble.

The Smartass: Rational, Extroverted, Brutal, Arrogant.

timmay told me about the breaking benjamin concert probably about a month ago and i made him get me tickets. we thought they were for last weekend, and brian and i were getting ready and everything when timmay called me (on his way to my house) and had me look at the tickets cuz his said the 12th, when he asked for the 5th, and the lady giving them to him said the 5th. wtf. well they were for the 12th and i was all depressed cuz i really really wanted to go and i didnt think i could call off 2 saturdays in a row. luckilly george (my one boss) understood and let me have off this weekend too. and im so glad he did cuz i love love love breaking benjamin. brian, timmay and i got there after the first band went on (we had to go on a little cruise b/c *SOMEONE* thought they lost their id **cough cought TIM cough** but it was in the trunk all along lol) after wandering around for a little trying to see if we knew ne one and that sort of thing we parked our asses in the back by the bar and waited untill cassandra and becky showed up, which they did not too long after we did, and we all chilled n listened to the second band. dont know who they were but they were ok...i think lol. i wasnt really paying attention cuz i hadn't seen cassandra n becky in a while and catching up takes so much more effort when you're ill, but they sounded like they were mostly doing coveres of other bands....i dunno, i just wanted to hear BB. i started getting all woozy and whatnot cuz it was really hot and smokey and i couldnt stand for very long without wanting to vomit, so i sat in the far corner of the little pavillion thing with the comfy chairs that we were all standing by in the back cuz it was the only seat open and it also happened to have the best view of the stage, so the girls came in and sat on my chair with me and the boys stood outside in front of us. by the time breaking benjamin finally came on becky was so hot and tired and hungry (they came straight from work and didnt have time to do ne thing before-hand) that they left halfway thru the first song, which kinda sux and i would have spent more time talking to them if i had known they were gonna leave so soon, but oh well, ill just have to try to see them later. BB was just as good, if not better than i expected them to be. i knew all but one or two of the songs and managed not only to stand thru them but sing...no...yell along with them (which now my poor throat is making me pay dearly for) and just had an all around good time. i even called it when they came back for an encore (which brian didnt think they were gonna do, but i did) i just *knew* they were gonna come out and play rain...one of my favorites....and they did. i was so happy...then they played a few more before finally getting off for real and we all (even timmy) came home and crashed.....i just wish i werent sick though, i would have loved to get closer...like *right* up against the stage where all the action was...bottles of water, guitar picks, drum sticks and bodies were flying everywhere. it was so awesome lol. but yeah....i had lots of fun and the next time i hear about them being in the area u can be damn sure im gonna be there :)

so i ended up NOT getting the job at the hartford. turns out i had a couple warrants out for my arrest for about the past 3 years....god damnit >.< not like i didnt KNOW about them, i never did anything with my citations when i got arrested...i just thought it was long enough ago not to matter ne more lol, guess they did. a couple days after i found out i wasnt gonna get it i went up to turkey hill and filled out an application again cuz i had already left the delivery company and there was NO WAY i was going back. then i called crawford up from the payphone there and was like "ok i know i have these fines, i would like to come in and get this all resolved (preferably without getting arrested) is this a possibility...?" and he was really nice and said "sure just come in and talk to me and ill fix you up" (not exactly but something to that effect). and i would like to take this time to thank timmay EVER so much cuz he came and got me after i woke him up at about 11 *BUM*. and took me over there, but he was at lunch so we had to come back later which kinda sucked cuz timmay was supposed to help some one move but being the wonderful friend he is he put it off and drove around with me and wasted time till we could go back (almost made him last for work [sorry dude :P] ). finally got to see crawford, all he did was ask me how old i was and i told him 21, added a couple things up and said i owed 373.00. he waived all the warrant fees and everything and charged me the minimum i could possibly pay. ROCK ON. so now im all legal and everything and its nice. im back up at turkey hill for a while. i have to wait 6 months until i can re-apply at the hartford which is ok i guess. every one is SO happy to see me and they have me on day shift mostly. that was my one condition for comming back. i am NOT to be on at night, and if i am, im not alone. they had no problem with that concidering why i left in the first place... i got my permit and im learning to drive! *EVERYBODY OFF THE SIDEWALKS!!!* lol. no im pretty good, i drive ok on the roads, its just pulling into parking spaces i have a little trouble with. the only problem is now i have to get a new one....and an id....and an SS# card..... i went to ocean city m.d. this weekend with brian and a his friend dougie and dougies g/f. we had a blast. we got down there friday night pretty late. got a room at 'bonita beach', pretty nice place. played cards and got drunk. then we decided to walk on the beach. it was gorgeous in the moonlight and there was a sandbar about 50 feet out so we had a nice little romp *on* the ocean lol. the only problem was about every 100 feet the waves had eroded the sandbar away from the undertow and we had to pick our way through waist deep water and craters in the sand....we got SOAKED but the water was really warm. i had so much fun. the next day we went down first thing and built a sand fort and went in the ocean, well brian and i went in, dougie and jill were being panseyasses and just watched....tid bit nippy but i hadent been to the shore in YEARS so there was no way i wasnt going in lol. later we rented mopeds. we were gonna rent wave runners but it was COLD and rainy and we couldnt find any places still open, being after the summer season and all, most places were closed. so anyway, got the mopeds and had SO much fun. we were out for an hour going up and down ALL the back roads and thru parking lots and just everywhere. the only PROBLEM was when we got back to return them i was minus my wallet. the damn thing fell out of my pocket SOMEWHERE down there, and there was absolutely no way we were gonna find it. i freaked out for a little while and finally called capital one and reported my card lost. that calmed me down a bit but it still sucked because we had planned to go to Secrets that night and there was no way i was getting in with out my id. oh well we had a good night ne way. they got a case of beer and i got a bottle of sambuka and we just stayed in and had a ball. fun fun. so now i need to make a new wallet and replace everything i had in it. this is gonna be such a pain in my ass but i guess it was worth it cuz i had a lot of fun loosing it lol.....

today was my first day at my new job....if you could call it that...i was only there for like 2 hours. my boss (Tim) was supposed to call me last night to tell me what time i needed to come in and to which office....that didnt happen. so i called him today around noon and asked if he wanted me to come in or what, but they were at a diner eating and he said hed call me back in a little bit...2 HOURS LATER, "hey can you get a ride up to airport rd?" ... "um...sure, when?" ... "now" ... "oh...ok...ill be up in a bit" im glad i was already showered and pretty much ready. way to give me a little warning buddy! ::sigh:: oh well. so i got there, Tim showed me around, gave me a paper that had what i needed to say on it, gave me a packet of papers that had all the customers info on it and said "ok...go ahead and start making calls" O_O its not like there was anything really to train me on...but i didnt expect them to just throw me into it right away. my first 5 calls....i wanted to die, i was tripping ALL over my own tongue, forgot everything that was RIGHT in front of me, and generally made myself sound like a TOTAL raving idiot....but then i made a few more and it got easier...half an hr later, im wizzing thru calls like a pro :) i need to be up at 5 am tomorrow morning so i can get ready and walk my ass up to the bosses house so his wife can give me a ride in and i get to do it all over again. ... aaarrrrrggggg. i am NOT a morning person and i dont rememeber the last time i was up that early for ANYTHING...unless i was still up from the night before, but hes really helping me out with this...they dont even really have a possition open yet, so i cant really bitch, plus...not being able to drive tends to make things more difficult then they need to be. i REALLY need to start moving on getting my lisence god damn it. erg i dont know how i feel about being a "secretary" yet...never quite saw myself doing this...but hey, ill take anything...and its a lot safer then retail. i only met a couple of the people i work with but they seem nice. its a very laid back atmosphere, and i dont need to worry about taking smoke breaks cuz theres 3 ashtrays on every desk LOL...now THAT is cool

actually technically yesterday was my last day, and monday is my first at my new job...but it sounded good anyway. and this morning i got my wisdoms pulled ow ow ow ow *omg* ow so bear with me....it got done at 1:30 and all that CRAP only *just* wore off 10 minutes ago. so yeah. yesterday was my last day at turkey hill. everyone was so sad to see me leave, 3 ppl wanted a hug, and 2 gave me money...LOL how funny is that. it sucks though because i liked working there. it was easy, all the customers were cool, and i could get away with murder....but such is life... my face hurts and i cant swallow right. this is not fun. not at all. brian was supposed to take me today. i told him....no lie 8 times not to scheduel ne appointments today, so he could take me and be there for me....but he forgot ::rolls eyes:: lol. s'ok though, i know he has a lot on his mind, what with running his own business and all. he asked his mom to help out and she was glad to, so she picked me up and took me there only to find out i was locked out of the office because the *freakin DOCTOR* took everyone out to lunch. it wasnt even a common thing! they just HAD to pick the day i was comming. grr. thats ok...the only reason i know that is because one of the nurses from that office was sitting there waiting too. everyone was in such a hurry to get out, that when she was taking a patient downstairs, they forgot about her and locked HER out too. lol oh well. so i waited (and talked to brians mom about all kinds of crap) and waited (and talked some more...she couldnt get over what i was telling her about the robbery...she likes to ask alot of questions lol) and waited and FINALLY everyone came back...i told them i was there took off all my jewelry and whatnot, they took me back and got me ready stuck an iv in my HAND....and the next thing i know.....well, i dont really remember...i was in a bed and my face was cold and puffy, then i was in an elevator...then i was in the car, then i was getting out and brian was right there, then i slept for 3 hrs and now here i am.......fun monday i get to start learning to be a secretary (if thats spelled right) woooooo freakin hoooooo. im sooo excited to start my new job NOT. bla, i always feel like this before i start a new job though. im sure ill get over it, and make the best of it. i really really need to start learning to drive though...oh yeah and btw....OOOOOOOOOOWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWIIIIIIIIIIIIIEEEEEEEEEEE
